alert.note: Alert for Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 9:25PM EST until January 31 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MONDAY TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers will increase in coverage and intensity late tonight, primarily north of M-28 between Paradise and Whitefish Point. This would include the Tahquamenon Falls area. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches will be possible by Monday night. * WHERE...Western Chippewa County. * WHEN...From 1 AM Monday to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
